# Load data

# Some plots
library(lattice)
#xyplot(11:30~11:30, )
p1 <- xyplot(Glu ~ Time, groups = PID, 
       data = glu[which(as.numeric(glu$PID) <= 50), ], 
       type = "b", pch = "*", cex = 2, col = rainbow(50), 
       main = "Glu over time; Patients 1-50", 
       scales = list(y = list(log = TRUE, equispaced.log = FALSE)),
       ylim = range(glu$Glu), 
       panel = function(...) {
           panel.xyplot(...)
           panel.abline(h = log(c(2.2, 4, 7.7, 10, 15), 10), lty = "dotted", col = "black")}
       )
# print(p1)
pdf("plots/p1.pdf", width = 20, height = 10); print(p1); dev.off()
